mapper.select: SELECT m.id as id, m.parent_id as parentId, m.create_time as createTime, m.title as title, m.level as level, m.sort as sort, m.name as name, m.icon as icon, m.hidden as hidden FROM ums_admin_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON arr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_menu_relation rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE arr.admin_id = #{adminId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL AND r.status = 1 GROUP BY m.id

SELECT m.id as id, m.parent_id as parentId, m.create_time as createTime, m.title as title, m.level as level, m.name as name, m.icon as icon, m.hidden as hidden FROM ums_role_menu_relation rmr LEFT JOIN ums_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE rmr.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id

SELECT r.id as id, r.create_time as createTime, r.`name` as `name`, r.url as url, r.description as description, r.category_id as categoryId FROM ums_role_resource_relation rrr LEFT JOIN ums_resource r ON rrr.resource_id = r.id WHERE rrr.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.id
